3000.name: The Reading Room
3000.description:
This is a small, simple room which is mostly empty, save a few wooden
desks and benches. To the east you hear the bustle of the Temple of
Midgaard, a sharp contrast to the relative quiet of this peaceful room.
One bookshelf seems oddly drafty, as if a gap hides behind it. The
ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: You see the Temple of Midgaard.

north.description: The shelves to the north look slightly misaligned.
north.reveal_message: You slide the bookshelf aside, revealing a narrow passage north.

3001.name: The Temple Of Midgaard
3001.description:
This is the southern end of the temple hall in the Temple of Midgaard.
The temple has been constructed from giant marble blocks, eternal in
appearance, and most of the walls are covered by ancient wall paintings
picturing Gods, Giants and peasants. Large steps lead down through the
grand temple gate, descending the huge mound upon which the temple is
built and ends on the temple square below. To the west, you see the
Reading Room. The donation room is in a small alcove to the east. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: At the northern end of the temple hall is a statue and a huge altar.

east.description: In the east, you see a small alcove with a rickety wooden sign which reads "Midgaard Donation Room."

south.description: You look down the huge stone steps at the temple square below.

up.description: A shimmering staircase of light ascends to the realm of the Immortals.

3002.name: The Clerics' Inner Sanctum
3002.description:
This is the inner sanctum. A picture of the mighty Thor, is hanging on
the wall, just above the altar which is set against the western wall. A
well in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness. Vile smells
waft from the depths. A magnificent marble fountain gurgles peacefully
in the center of the square. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: You see your favorite place, the bar of divination.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3003.name: The Bar Of Divination
3003.description:
The bar is one of the finest in the land, lucky it is members only. Fine
furniture is set all around the room. A small sign is hanging on the
wall. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

3004.name: The Entrance To The Clerics' Guild
3004.description:
The entrance hall is a small modest room, reflecting the true nature of
the Clerics. The exit leads east to the temple square. A small entrance
to the bar is in the northern wall. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: You see the bar, richly decorated with really stylish furniture.

south.description: The training grounds are to the south.

3005.name: The Temple Square
3005.description:
This area is the temple square. Huge marble steps lead up to the temple
gate to the north. In the center of the square, a magnificent marble
fountain gurgles peacefully, its crystal waters catching the light. The
entrance to the Clerics' Guild is to the west, and the old Grunting Boar
Inn is to the east. The market square lies to the south, and the training grounds are to the west. A cold draft seeps up from cracks
between the stones beneath the stairs. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: You see the good old Grunting Boar Inn.

west.description: You see the entrance to the Clerics' Guild.

down.description: A narrow gap between the stones drops into darkness.
down.reveal_message: You pry up a loose flagstone, exposing a hidden way down.

3006.name: The Entrance Hall Of The Grunting Boar Inn
3006.description:
This is the entrance hall of the Grunting Boar Inn. The hall has been
wisely decorated with simple, functional furniture. The heavy smell of
dust and aging paper drifts in from the Post Office to the north. A
small staircase leads up to the reception and the bar is to the east.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the
corners.

north.description: You see the Midgaard Post Office.

3007.name: The Grunting Boar
3007.description:
This is the bar. The bar is set against the northern wall, old archaic
writing, carvings and symbols cover its top. A fireplace is built into
the western wall, and through the southeastern windows you can see the
temple square. This place makes you feel like home. A small sign with
big letters is fastened to the bar. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The
air is still and musty.

west.description: You see the exit to the entrance hall.

3008.name: The Reception
3008.description:
This is the reception. The staircase leads down to the entrance hall. An
exit to the north leads to the Cryogenic Center. There is a small sign
on the counter. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows
gather in the corners.

3010.name: The General Store
3010.description:
This isside the general store. All sorts of items are stacked on shelves
behind the counter, safely out of your reach. A small note hangs on the
wall. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch.

3011.name: The Weapon Shop
3011.description:
This isside the weapon shop. There is a small note on the counter. The
air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is stale
and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

3012.name: Main Street
3012.description:
This is the end of the main street of Midgaard. South of here is the
entrance to the Guild of Magic Users. The street continues east towards
the market square. The magic shop is to the north and to the west is the
city gate. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past.

south.description: You see the entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.

3013.name: Main Street
3013.description:
The area is the main street passing through the City of Midgaard. South
of here is the entrance to the Armory, and the bakery is to the north.
East of here is the market square. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
The sounds of city life echo around.

3014.name: Market Square
3014.description:
This area is the market square, the famous Square of Midgaard. A large,
peculiar looking statue is standing in the middle of the square. Roads
lead in every direction, north to the temple square, south to the common
square, east and westbound is the main street. A grand marble building
to the west bears the sign 'First National Bank'. A small stone
fountain bubbles cheerfully near the statue. The statue's base hums
faintly, runes flickering when no one looks directly at them. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

west.description: A seam in the statue base leads west.
west.reveal_message: A section of the statue base dissolves, opening a concealed passage west.

3015.name: Main Street
3015.description:
The area is the main street crossing through town. To the north is the
general store, and the main street continues east. To the west you see
and hear the market place, to the south a small door leads into the Pet
Shop. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on
all sides.

3016.name: Main Street
3016.description:
The main street, to the north is the weapon shop and to the south is the
Guild of Swordsmen. To the east you leave town and to the west the
street leads to the market square. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

west.description: You see the main street leading to the market square.

3017.name: The Entrance To The Mages' Guild
3017.description:
The entrance hall to this guild is a small, poor lighted room. The air
is still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is stale and
the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

south.description: You see your favorite place, the Mages' Bar.

3018.name: The Mages' Bar
3018.description:
The bar is one of the weirdest in the land. Mystical images float around
the air. Illusions of fine furniture appear all around the room. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

3019.name: The Mages' Laboratory
3019.description:
This is the Magical Experiments Laboratory. Dark smoke-stained stones
arch over numerous huge oaken tables, most of these cluttered with
strange- looking pipes and flasks. The floor is covered with half-erased
pentagrams and even weirder symbols, and a blackboard in a dark corner
has only been partially cleaned, some painful-looking letters faintly
visible. A well in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.
Vile smells waft from the depths. Shadows gather in the corners. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3020.name: The Armory
3020.description:
The armory with all kinds of armors on the walls and in the window. You
see helmets, shields and chain mails. To the north is the main street.
On the wall is a small note. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

3021.name: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Swordsmen
3021.description:
The entrance hall to the Guild of Swordsmen. A place where one has to be
careful not to say something wrong (or right). To the east is the bar
and to the north is the main street. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: You see the swordsmen's bar, many noises comes from there.

3022.name: The Bar Of Swordsmen
3022.description:
The bar of swordsmen, once upon a time beautifully furnished. But now
the furniture is all around in small pieces. To the south is the
yard, and to the west is the entrance hall. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

west.description: You see the entrance hall to the warriors' guild.

3023.name: The Tournament And Practice Yard
3023.description:
This is the practice yard of the fighters. To the north is the bar. A
well leads down into darkness. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. The air is still and musty.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3024.name: The Eastern End Of Poor Alley
3024.description:
This is the poor alley. South of here is the Grubby Inn and to the east
you see common square. The alley continues further west. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

3025.name: The Common Square
3025.description:
The common square, people pass you, talking to each other. To the west
is the poor alley and to the east is the dark alley. To the north, this
square is connected to the market square. From the south you notice a
nasty smell. The cobblestones near the old well look loose. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

down.description: A hidden passage descends into darkness.

3026.name: The Dark Alley
3026.description:
The dark alley, to the west is the common square and to the south is the
Guild of Thieves. The alley continues east. The sounds of city life echo
around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

south.description: You see the entrance to the thieves' guild.

3027.name: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Thieves
3027.description:
The entrance hall to the thieves' and assassins' guild. A place where
you can lose both your life and your money, if you are not careful. To
the north is the dark alley and to the east is the thieves' bar. Shadows
gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

east.description: You see the thieves bar, where everything disappears.

3028.name: The Thieves' Bar
3028.description:
The bar of the thieves. Once upon a time this place was beautifully
furnished, but now it seems almost empty. To the south is the yard, and
to the west is the entrance hall. (Maybe the furniture has been
stolen?!) Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

west.description: You see the entrance hall to the thieves' guild.

3029.name: The Secret Yard
3029.description:
The secret practice yard of thieves and assassins. To the north is the
bar. A well leads down into darkness. The air is still and musty. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3030.name: The Dump
3030.description:
The dump, where the people from the city drop their garbage. Through the
garbage Visible is a large junction of pipes, looks like the entrance to
the sewer system. North of here you see the common square. The open sky
stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

3031.name: The Pet Shop
3031.description:
The Pet Shop is a small crowded store, full of cages and animals of
various sizes. There is a sign on the wall. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

3032.name: Pet Shop Store
3032.description:
This is the small dark room in which the Pet shop keeps his pets. It is
vital that this room's virtual number is exactly one larger than the Pet
Shop number. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch.

3033.name: The Magic Shop
3033.description:
Behind the counter you see various items, neatly placed in racks,
presumably most of them are magic. The air is still and musty. Dust
motes drift in the stale air.

3040.name: Inside The West Gate Of Midgaard
3040.description:
The area is by two small towers that have been built into the city wall
and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate. Main
Street leads east and Wall Road leads south from here. High above, a
shadowed ledge looks like it could hide a watch post. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

south.description: You see the road running along the inner side of the city wall.  You notice that it is called Wall Road.

west.description: The city gate is to the west.

up.description: A narrow trapdoor in the ceiling.
up.reveal_message: You find a trapdoor concealed by soot and grime.

3041.name: Inside The East Gate Of Midgaard
3041.description:
The area is by two small towers that have been built into the city wall
and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate. Main
Street leads west from here. To the south you see the Water Shop. The
sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

3042.name: Wall Road
3042.description:
The way continues next to the western city wall. The road continues
further south and the city gate is just north of here. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

3043.name: Wall Road
3043.description:
The way continues next to the western city wall. Wall Road continues
further north and south. A small, poor alley leads east. Some letters
have been written on the wall here. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

3044.name: Poor Alley
3044.description:
The area is Poor Alley, which continues further east. You see the city
wall to the west. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

3045.name: The Dark Alley At The Levee
3045.description:
This is the alley which continues east and west. South of here you see
the levee. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

3046.name: The Eastern End Of The Alley
3046.description:
The area opens at the eastern end of the alley, the city wall is just
east, blocking any further movement. A small warehouse is directly south
of here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

3047.name: Wall Road
3047.description:
This area is the road next to the western city wall, which continues
north. South of here is a bridge across the river. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

3048.name: Grubby Inn
3048.description:
This isside the old Grubby Inn. This place has not been cleaned for
several decades; vile smells make you dizzy. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

3049.name: The Levee
3049.description:
This is the levee. South of here you see the river gently flowing west.
The river bank is very low making it possible to enter the river.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet.

south.description: You see the river flowing west.

3050.name: The Deserted Warehouse
3050.description:
This isside the warehouse. The room is decorated with various old items
from ships. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

3051.name: On The Bridge
3051.description:
This area is the stone bridge crosses the river. The bridge is built out
from the western city wall and the river flows west through an opening
in the wall ten feet below the bridge. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. The sounds of city life echo around.

3052.name: Outside The West Gate Of Midgaard
3052.description:
The area is by two small towers that have been built into the city wall
and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate. To the
west Visible is the edge of a big forest. A shadowy path leads south into the Forest of Shadows. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The city gate is to the east.

west.description: The forest edge is to the west.

south.description: A shadowy path leads into the Forest of Shadows.

3053.name: Outside The East Gate Of Midgaard
3053.description:
The area is by two small towers that have been built into the city wall
and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate. To the
east the plains stretch out in the distance. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

3054.name: By The Temple Altar
3054.description:
The area is by the temple altar in the northern end of the Temple of
Midgaard. A huge altar made from white polished marble is standing ahead
and behind it is a ten foot tall sitting statue of Odin, the King of the
Gods. To the north, steps lead out the back of the temple towards the
countryside. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

north.description: You see the vast Midgaard countryside.

south.description: You see the southern end of the temple.

extra_descs.ven though the altar is more than ten fe: a single block of white virgin marble.

3055.name: Odin's Store
3055.description:
This is the small dark room in which Odin keeps the player items that he
takes care of. It is vital that this room's virtual number is exactly
one larger than the room by the temple altar. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

3058.name: Ye Olde Water Shoppe
3058.description:
This is the center of a small wooden shop whose walls are covered with
racks upon racks of water jugs. Several large barrels with spigots are
stacked in the corner. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

3059.name: Behind The Temple Altar
3059.description:
The area is a dirt path leading away from the Temple Altar which is
south of here. To the north, the path continues through the lush
contryside of Midgaard towards the Dragonhelm Mountains far off to the
north. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You see the lush, green countryside of Midgaard.

3060.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3060.description:
A path runs through a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside. Visible is to the horizon to the north, east, and
west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south. All around is healthy
green grass and an occasional large oak tree. The sun feels wonderful on
your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair. Birds chirp
quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and
freshly cut grass. You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions. The
path you are on continues north through the field and south back to
Midgaard. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You see more of the path through the Great Field.

south.description: You see the path which goes back to Midgaard.

3061.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3061.description:
A path runs through a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside. Visible is to the horizon to the north, east, and
west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south. All around is healthy
green grass and an occasional large oak tree. The sun feels wonderful on
your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair. Birds chirp
quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and
freshly cut grass. You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.
There is a strange structure on the eastern side of the path. A small
dirt path splits off of the main path and leads off to the west. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air.

north.description: The path continues northwards bringing you ever closer to the Dragonhelm Mountains.

east.description: There is a strange structure to the east on the edge of the trail.

south.description: You see more of the Field.

west.description: There is a strange path leading towards a rusty gate to the west.

3062.name: The Post Office
3062.description:
This is the central post office for Midgaard. Piles of assorted mail lay
untouched in the corners, collecting cobwebs. Several large crates have
been pried open by curious customs agents, and are now stacked along the
west wall, hiding plenty of 'WANTED' posters. There is a sign posted on
the wall here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
sounds of city life echo around.

south.description: You see the entrance to the Grunting Boar Inn and Tavern.

extra_descs.nvelopes of all sizes are heaped into hu: look closer, you see a letter that you had posted a full week ago, laying unnoticed and slightly rat-chewed towards the bottom of the pile.

3063.name: The Midgaard Donation Room
3063.description:
This is a small, undecorated room just off of the main temple. There are
a couple of small wooden benches here where people occasionally sit
while they wait for items to appear. The temple is to the west. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

west.description: The busy temple is back west.

3064.name: The Cryogenic Center
3064.description:
This is an impossible white sterile room with cylindrical body-length
canisters lined up against the walls. The Reception is to the south. The
sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs
in the air.

south.description: The Reception is to the south.

3065.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3065.description:
A path runs through a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside. Visible is to the horizon to the north, east, and
west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south. All around is healthy
green grass and an occasional large oak tree. The sun feels wonderful on
your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair. Birds chirp
quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and
freshly cut grass. You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions. The
way north appears to be blocked by a large plot device and you cannot
see any way around it. The open sky stretches overhead. Tall grass sways
in a gentle breeze.

south.description: The path continues through the field to the south past an odd structure on the eastern side of the path.

3066.name: The Dirt Path
3066.description:
A path winds along a narrow dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside. Visible is to the horizon to the north and east;
the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south. All around is healthy green
grass and an occasional large oak tree. The sun feels wonderful on your
face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair. Birds chirp quietly to
themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and freshly cut
grass. You feel like you could lie down in the grass and stay here
forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions. There is a
large rusty gate sitting in a stone archway just to the west. The ground
is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: The path meets up with a larger path just to the east.

west.description: There is a large rusty gate just to the west.

3069.name: First National Bank of Midgaard
3069.description:
The area opens in the marble-floored lobby of Midgaard's most
prestigious financial institution. Iron-barred teller windows line the
northern wall, where a well-dressed banker handles transactions with
efficient precision. Ornate columns support the vaulted ceiling, and oil
paintings of the city's founding merchants hang on the walls. A brass
plaque near the door reads 'Est. Year 1 of the Third Age'. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The statue base cache is to the south.

3070.name: An Abandoned Scriptorium
3070.description:
Dusty desks and ink-stained parchment are scattered across this
forgotten scriptorium. A single candle stub clings to a wrought holder,
long since cold. The air smells of vellum and age. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. The air is still and musty.

south.description: The bookshelf passage leads back south.

3071.name: A Catacomb Niche
3071.description:
A narrow niche tucked beneath the temple stones. Old votive bowls line
the walls, and a small reliquary sits on a cracked pedestal. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

up.description: A cramped crawlspace leads back up.

3072.name: The Statue Base Cache
3072.description:
Hidden within the statue, this cramped chamber holds a few offerings, a
shallow basin, and a stone shelf carved with prayer marks. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The passage returns to the market square.

north.description: The bank is to the north.

3073.name: The Old Watch Post
3073.description:
This cramped watch post overlooks the west gate through narrow slits. A
battered coffer sits against the wall, and the air smells of old oil and
smoke. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

down.description: The trapdoor drops back to the west gate.

3074.name: The Forgotten Passage
3074.description:
A narrow passage descends into darkness. The walls are damp with
condensation and the air reeks of decay. This entrance was clearly
hidden for a reason - perhaps to keep something in, rather than keep
people out. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

up.description: A hidden trapdoor leads back to the surface.

down.description: The passage descends further into darkness.

3075.name: The Sewer King's Domain
3075.description:
This vast chamber stinks of rot and refuse. Bones litter the floor, and
makeshift totems of rat skulls line the walls. A crude throne of garbage
and bones sits at the far end. Something large and terrible rules here.
The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

up.description: The passage leads back toward the surface.

east.description: A dark tunnel leads deeper into the sewers.

3076.name: The Shadow Crossing
3076.description:
The darkness here is unnatural, seeming to swallow even magical light.
Shadows move of their own accord along the walls. You feel watched by
unseen eyes. The air is deathly cold. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

west.description: The tunnel leads back to the Sewer King's domain.

north.description: An ancient archway leads to something older...

east.description: A passage wreathed in shadow leads to an ancient sanctum.

3077.name: The Guardian's Vault
3077.description:
This ancient chamber predates the city above by millennia. Runes of
power are carved into every surface, pulsing with faint light. At the
center stands a massive stone golem, eternally vigilant. Behind it, a
treasure chest gleams with promise. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The archway leads back to the shadows.

3078.name: The Training Grounds
3078.description:
This open courtyard serves as Midgaard's training grounds, where new
adventurers learn the art of combat. Straw dummies stand in neat rows,
bearing the scars of countless practice sessions. Wooden weapon racks
line the walls, and the ground is packed hard from years of footwork
drills. A grizzled sergeant watches over the area, occasionally barking
corrections at those whose form displeases him. The Temple Square lies
to the north. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The Clerics' Guild entrance is to the north.

3080.name: The Threshold of Shadows
3080.description:
The air grows cold and heavy as you enter this passage. Torches burn
with an eerie green flame, casting dancing shadows on walls etched with
runic symbols of death and rebirth. The scent of grave soil and ancient
incense hangs in the still air. A foreboding presence seems to watch
from the darkness beyond.

west.description: The Shadow Crossing lies to the west.

north.description: A corridor of bones leads deeper into the sanctum.

3081.name: The Bone Corridor
3081.description:
Skulls and bones of countless creatures line the walls of this macabre
hallway, arranged in intricate patterns that seem almost artistic in
their grotesque beauty. Candles flicker in empty eye sockets, providing
weak illumination. The bones whisper secrets to those who know how to
listen. The corridor opens into a larger chamber to the north.

south.description: The threshold lies to the south.

north.description: The main hall of the guild awaits.

3082.name: The Necromancers' Guild
3082.description:
This vaulted chamber serves as the heart of the Necromancers' Guild.
Ancient tomes line shelves carved from black stone, their pages filled
with forbidden knowledge. A ritual circle inlaid with silver dominates
the floor, surrounded by candelabras dripping with black wax. The air
hums with dark energy, and the veil between life and death feels thin
here.

east.description: A private study lies beyond a dark curtain.

3083.name: The Inner Sanctum
3083.description:
This private study belongs to the guildmaster. Shelves hold preserved
specimens in jars, reagents for dark rituals, and scrolls of ancient
power. A desk covered in notes and diagrams sits against one wall.
A summoning circle is etched permanently into the stone floor, faint
traces of otherworldly energy still lingering within its bounds.

west.description: The main guild hall lies beyond the curtain.

3000.name: wizard
3000.long_desc: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
3000.description:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard.  He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

3001.name: baker
3001.long_desc: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
3001.description:
A fat, nice looking baker.  But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

3002.name: grocer
3002.long_desc: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
3002.description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

3003.name: weaponsmith
3003.description:
He is a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn but he is still
eager to sell you his latest implements of carnage and destruction.

3004.name: armourer
3004.long_desc: An armourer stands here displaying his new (and previously owned) armours.
3004.description:
An old but very strong armourer.  He has made more suits of armour in his
life than you have ever seen.

3005.name: receptionist
3005.long_desc: A receptionist is standing behind the counter here, smiling at you.
3005.description:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

3006.name: captain
3006.long_desc: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
3006.description: This captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

3007.name: sailor
3007.long_desc: A sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
3007.description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

3008.name: uncle
3008.long_desc: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.
3008.description: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.

3009.name: wally
3009.long_desc: Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter.
3009.description:
Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong.  He has a glass of Midgaard
Natural Spring Water in his hand.  When he notices you, he proudly
displays his fine collection of contemporary waters.

3010.name: postmaster
3010.long_desc: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
3010.description:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many
people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.

3020.name: guildmaster
3020.long_desc: Your guildmaster is studying a spellbook while preparing to cast a spell.
3020.description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

3021.name: guildmaster
3021.long_desc: Your guildmaster is prayer to your God here.
3021.description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your God; he
has a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white
aura.

3022.name: guildmaster
3022.long_desc: A beggar is sitting here, could she be a guildmaster?
3022.description:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

3023.name: guildmaster
3023.long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here sharpening an axe.
3023.description:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.

3024.name: sorcerer
3024.long_desc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
3024.description:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

3025.name: knight
3025.long_desc: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
3025.description:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the
Faith.  His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel
attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes
him a deadly opponent.

3026.name: assassin
3026.long_desc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
3026.description:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as
possible, using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how
and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes
him a deadly opponent.

3027.name: knight
3027.long_desc: A knight is guarding the entrance.
3027.description:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

3040.name: bartender
3040.long_desc: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
3040.description: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

3041.name: waiter
3041.long_desc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.

3042.name: waiter
3042.long_desc: A man now leads a quiet, peaceful life as a waiter is standing here.
3042.description:
This man was obviously a famous sorcerer in his younger days as you
instantly recognize his face.

3043.name: waiter
3043.long_desc: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with his God is standing here.
3043.description:
This waiter almost makes you feel like you should drop to your knees
and begin to worship your God.  Naaah.

3044.name: waiter
3044.long_desc: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money is standing here.
3044.description: Hmmm... wonder where he got that coin he is playing with.

3045.name: waiter
3045.description:
This guy looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.

3046.name: filthy
3046.long_desc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
3046.description:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty.  He likes to keep his customers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

3059.name: keeper
3059.long_desc: A Peacekeeper is standing here, ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.
3059.description: He looks very strong and wise.  Looks like he doesn't answer to ANYONE.

3060.name: cityguard
3060.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3061.name: janitor
3061.long_desc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
3061.description: What a tough job he has.

3062.name: fido
3062.long_desc: A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage looking for food here.
3062.description:
The fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat
hanging around his teeth.

3063.name: mercenary
3063.long_desc: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.
3063.description: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.

3064.name: drunk
3064.description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

3065.name: beggar
3065.long_desc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
3065.description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

3066.name: odif
3066.long_desc: An odif yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.
3066.description: The odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.

3067.name: cityguard
3067.long_desc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
3067.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3068.name: green
3068.long_desc: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
3068.description: A horrid looking thing; it is huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.

3089.name: pet
3089.long_desc: There is a Pet Shop Boy standing here cuddleing something furry in his hands.
3089.description: As you look at him, he opens his hands to reveal a rat!

3090.name: kitten
3090.long_desc: A small loyal kitten is here.
3090.description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

3091.name: puppy
3091.long_desc: A small loyal puppy is here.
3091.description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

3092.name: beagle
3092.long_desc: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
3092.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

3093.name: rottweiler
3093.long_desc: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
3093.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

3094.name: wolf
3094.long_desc: A large, trained wolf is here.
3094.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

3095.name: cryogenicist
3095.long_desc: The cryogenicist is here, playing with a canister of liquid nitrogen.
3095.description:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

3110.name: guide
3110.long_desc: A friendly temple guide stands here, ready to help new adventurers.
3110.description: The temple guide smiles warmly and looks eager to offer advice to newcomers.

3111.name: banker
3111.long_desc: A well-dressed bank teller stands behind a brass counter.
3111.description: The bank teller keeps a careful eye on the ledgers, ready to assist with deposits or withdrawals.

3120.name: sewer king
3120.description: The Sewer King is a hulking rat-man, easily seven feet tall. His matted fur is slick with filth, and he wears a crude crown fashioned from the bones of his victims. His beady red eyes gleam with cunning malice.

3121.name: shadow assassin
3121.long_desc: A figure cloaked in living darkness watches from the shadows.
3121.description: The shadow assassin seems to flicker in and out of existence. Where its face should be, there is only darkness. It moves with supernatural grace, daggers dripping with poison.

3122.name: ancient guardian
3122.long_desc: A towering stone golem stands watch, runes glowing on its body.
3122.description: The Ancient Guardian has stood here for millennia. Its stone body is covered in protective runes that pulse with arcane energy. It attacks any who would disturb the treasure it protects.

3130.name: street urchin
3130.long_desc: A scrappy young street urchin darts about, eyes alert for opportunity.
3130.description: This young urchin has learned to survive on the streets of Midgaard. Quick and nimble, they know every alley and shortcut in the city.

3131.name: stray dog
3131.long_desc: A thin, mangy dog sniffs around for scraps.
3131.description: This poor dog has been living on the streets, scrounging for whatever food it can find.

3132.name: drunk patron
3132.long_desc: A drunk patron stumbles about, mumbling incoherently.
3132.description: This patron has clearly had far too much to drink. They sway unsteadily and occasionally burst into song.

3133.name: pickpocket
3133.long_desc: A shifty-eyed figure lurks in the shadows, watching for easy marks.
3133.description: This pickpocket has quick hands and quicker feet. They prey on distracted travelers and unwary merchants.

3134.name: rat
3134.long_desc: A large rat scurries about, searching for food.
3134.description: An oversized rat, bold enough to venture out even in daylight.

3030.name: ranger
3030.long_desc: A weathered ranger stands here, bow at the ready.
3030.description: This grizzled tracker has spent decades in the wild. Scars from countless hunts mark her arms, and her keen eyes miss nothing.

3031.name: paladin
3031.long_desc: A holy knight in shining armor kneels in prayer.
3031.description: This noble knight radiates an aura of righteousness. His armor gleams with divine light, and his sword bears holy runes.

3032.name: bard
3032.long_desc: A flamboyant bard strums a lute while humming a tune.
3032.description: This charismatic performer has traveled the world collecting songs and stories. Her voice can charm friend and foe alike.

3033.name: necromancer
3033.long_desc: A hooded figure shrouded in dark mist stands here.
3033.description: Shadows seem to cling to this master of death. Pale hands emerge from dark robes, and the faint smell of decay follows him.

3200.name: Sage Aldric
3200.long_desc: Sage Aldric stands here, ready to guide new adventurers.
3200.description:
Sage Aldric is an elderly man with a long white beard and kind, knowing eyes. He wears simple robes of deep blue, adorned with silver runes. A faint aura of wisdom surrounds him, and his voice carries the weight of countless years spent guiding young adventurers.

He seems eager to help newcomers find their way.

ai_config.greet_message: Ah, a new face! Welcome to Midgaard, traveler. I am Sage Aldric. If you seek guidance, simply speak with me.

topics.help: I can teach you the ways of survival in these lands. Would you like to begin your training?
topics.quest: I offer guidance to those new to adventuring. Type 'quest' to see what tasks await you.
topics.midgaard: This city has stood for centuries as a beacon of civilization. The Temple behind me is sacred ground.
topics.combat: Combat is a necessary skill. South of the square are training grounds where you can practice safely.
topics.skills: Each class has unique abilities. Visit your guildmaster to improve your skills through practice.

3201.name: training dummy
3201.long_desc: A straw training dummy stands here, waiting to be struck.
3201.description: This is a man-shaped dummy made of burlap and stuffed with straw. It's mounted on a wooden post and has clearly seen better days - countless sword cuts and arrow holes mark its surface. Perfect for practicing your combat skills without real danger.

3202.name: combat instructor
3202.long_desc: Sergeant Bron stands here, watching recruits with a critical eye.
3202.description: Sergeant Bron is a grizzled veteran with a scarred face and arms like tree trunks. He wears worn but well-maintained armor and carries a wooden practice sword. His eyes constantly scan for poor form or lazy swings.

ai_config.greet_message: You there! Looking to train? The dummies won't hit back - much. Show me what you've got!

topics.train: Attack the dummies to practice. Use 'kill dummy' to begin.
topics.combat: In combat, you attack automatically each round. Use skills and spells to gain advantage.
topics.flee: If a fight goes bad, type 'flee' to escape. No shame in living to fight another day.

3000.name: barrel
3000.room_desc: A beer barrel has been left here.

3001.name: bottle
3001.room_desc: A beer bottle has been left here.

3002.name: bottle
3002.room_desc: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.

3003.name: bottle
3003.room_desc: A bottle of firebreather has been left here.

3004.name: bottle
3004.room_desc: A dark bottle has been left here.

3005.name: key
3005.room_desc: A key made of a dull metal is lying on the ground here.

3009.name: waybread
3009.room_desc: Some waybread has been put here.

3010.name: bread
3010.room_desc: A loaf of bread has been left here.

3011.name: danish
3011.room_desc: A nice looking delicious danish pastry has been placed here.

3012.name: taco
3012.room_desc: A tasty looking Mexican taco has been dropped here.

3013.name: burrito
3013.room_desc: A spicy looking burrito has been set here.

3014.name: nachos
3014.room_desc: Some nachos have been left here.

3015.name: meat
3015.room_desc: A rather dubious looking piece of meat is on the ground here.

3020.name: dagger
3020.room_desc: A dagger with a long thin blade is here.

3022.name: sword
3022.room_desc: A long sword has been left here.

3023.name: club
3023.room_desc: A simple looking wooden club is here.

3024.name: warhammer
3024.room_desc: A medium sized warhammer is here.

3034.name: atm
3034.room_desc: An automatic teller machine has been installed in the wall here.

3035.name: fountain
3035.room_desc: A large fountain carved from blue-streaked marble is here, bubbling merrily.
3035.description: This magnificent fountain is carved from blue-streaked marble. Crystal clear water bubbles up from the center, cascading down in gentle streams. The peaceful sound of flowing water fills the square.

3036.name: cashcard
3036.room_desc: A handy dandy cashcard is sitting on the ground here.

3038.name: nail
3038.room_desc: A penny nail lies in the dust.

3039.name: pot
3039.room_desc: A cast-iron pot sits on the ground.

3040.name: plate
3040.room_desc: A breast plate is lying on the ground.

3041.name: shirt
3041.room_desc: A chain mail shirt is lying on the ground.

3042.name: shield
3042.room_desc: A small wooden shield is lying on the ground.

3043.name: jacket
3043.room_desc: A soft leather jacket is lying on the ground.

3044.name: jacket
3044.room_desc: A studded leather jacket is lying on the ground.

3045.name: jacket
3045.room_desc: A scale mail jacket is lying on the ground.

3046.name: plate
3046.room_desc: A bronze breast plate is lying on the ground.

3050.name: scroll
3050.room_desc: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

3051.name: potion
3051.short_desc: a yellow potion of see invisible
3051.room_desc: A small yellow potion has carelessly been left here.

3052.name: scroll
3052.room_desc: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

3053.name: wand
3053.room_desc: A grey wand has carelessly been left here.

3054.name: staff
3054.room_desc: A gnarled staff has carelessly been left here.

3055.name: staff
3055.room_desc: A metal staff has carelessly been left here.

3060.name: raft
3060.room_desc: A raft has been left here.

3061.name: canoe
3061.room_desc: A canoe has been left here.

3070.name: gauntlets
3070.room_desc: A pair of bronze gauntlets is lying on the ground.

3071.name: gloves
3071.room_desc: A pair of leather gloves is lying on the ground.

3075.name: helmet
3075.room_desc: A bronze helmet is lying on the ground.

3076.name: cap
3076.room_desc: A leather cap is lying on the ground.

3080.name: leggings
3080.room_desc: A pair of bronze leggings is lying on the ground.

3081.name: pants
3081.room_desc: A pair of leather pants is lying on the ground.

3085.name: sleeves
3085.room_desc: A pair of bronze sleeves is lying on the ground.

3086.name: sleeves
3086.room_desc: A pair of leather sleeves is lying on the ground.

3096.name: board
3096.room_desc: A large, sociable bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.

3097.name: board
3097.room_desc: A large bulletin board is here, carved from a block of ice.

3098.name: board
3098.room_desc: A large bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.  It glows with a faint aura.

3099.name: board
3099.room_desc: A large bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.

3100.name: fountain marble
3100.room_desc: A beautiful marble fountain stands here, water trickling peacefully.
3100.description: This ornate marble fountain features carved dolphins spouting crystal-clear water into a wide basin. The water is cool and refreshing.

3101.name: bread loaf
3101.room_desc: A fresh loaf of bread lies here.
3101.description: A crusty loaf of freshly baked bread, still warm from the oven.

3102.name: waterskin
3102.description: A sturdy leather waterskin for carrying water on long journeys.

3103.name: fountain stone
3103.room_desc: A small stone fountain bubbles here.
3103.description: A modest stone fountain provides fresh water to the market square.

3120.name: bone crown scepter
3120.room_desc: A scepter made of fused bones lies here, emanating foul energy.
3120.description: This grotesque scepter was fashioned by the Sewer King from the bones of his enemies. Dark magic pulses through it.

3121.name: ratking crown
3121.short_desc: the Crown of the Rat King
3121.room_desc: A crown of yellowed bones lies here.
3121.description: This crown grants the wearer dominion over vermin. Rats seem to bow in its presence.

3122.name: plague ring
3122.room_desc: A tarnished ring pulses with sickly green light.
3122.description: This ring was forged in disease and death. Its wearer becomes immune to common poisons.

3123.name: shadow dagger
3123.room_desc: A dagger of pure darkness lies here, drinking in the light.
3123.description: This dagger was forged from solidified shadow. It seems to hunger for blood.

3124.name: shadow cloak
3124.room_desc: A cloak woven from living darkness pools on the ground.
3124.description: This cloak seems to bend light around itself. The wearer becomes harder to see and hit.

3125.name: assassin boots
3125.room_desc: A pair of jet-black boots lies here.
3125.description: These boots make no sound when walking. Perfect for those who prefer to strike unseen.

3126.name: guardian hammer
3126.room_desc: A massive stone hammer covered in glowing runes lies here.
3126.description: This hammer was wielded by the Ancient Guardian for millennia. The runes carved into it still pulse with protective magic.

3127.name: runic shield
3127.room_desc: A shield of carved stone radiates protective energy.
3127.description: Carved from the same stone as the Ancient Guardian, this shield bears runes of protection that glow when danger approaches.

3128.name: ancient amulet
3128.room_desc: A glowing amulet of incredible power lies here.
3128.description: This amulet predates recorded history. It thrums with raw magical power. Legends say it was worn by the first archmage.

3130.name: meat pie
3130.room_desc: A delicious-looking meat pie sits here.
3130.description: A flaky-crusted pie filled with seasoned meat and vegetables.

3131.name: cheese wheel
3131.room_desc: A wheel of cheese lies here.
3131.description: Aged for months, this cheese has a sharp, rich flavor.

3132.name: apple
3132.room_desc: A shiny red apple sits here.
3132.description: A crisp, fresh apple from the orchards outside the city.

3133.name: wine bottle
3133.room_desc: A dusty bottle of wine lies here.
3133.description: An excellent vintage from the southern vineyards.

3134.name: healing potion
3134.room_desc: A small red vial glows faintly.
3134.description: This red potion restores health when consumed.

3135.name: mana potion
3135.room_desc: A small blue vial shimmers with energy.
3135.description: This blue potion restores magical energy when consumed.

3136.name: torch
3136.room_desc: A torch lies on the ground.
3136.description: A simple wooden torch coated with pitch. It will provide light in dark places.

3137.name: rope
3137.room_desc: A coil of rope lies here.
3137.description: Fifty feet of hemp rope, useful for climbing or binding.

3138.name: bandages
3138.room_desc: A roll of bandages lies here.
3138.description: Clean linen bandages for treating wounds.

3200.name: vial of viper venom
3200.room_desc: A vial of viper venom lies here.
3200.description: Extracted from the fangs of the deadliest vipers, this venom causes excruciating pain and immediate tissue damage.

3201.name: vial of neurotoxin
3201.room_desc: A vial of yellow neurotoxin lies here.
3201.description: A paralytic toxin that blinds the target temporarily.

3202.name: vial of hemotoxin
3202.room_desc: A vial of crimson hemotoxin lies here.
3202.description: A blood poison that causes severe internal bleeding.

3210.name: a leather-bound chronicle
3210.room_desc: A leather-bound chronicle rests on a dusty desk.
3210.description: The cover reads "Chronicle of the First Wall" in faded ink.
3210.lore_text: "We raised the first wall of Midgaard with sweat, prayer, and borrowed stone from the giants. The walls did not merely keep danger out; they kept hope in."

3211.name: a sealed temple letter
3211.room_desc: A sealed letter lies tucked into a votive bowl.
3211.description: Wax bears the imprint of a stylized hammer.
3211.lore_title: Letter of the First High Priest
3211.lore_text: "Keep the reliquary hidden. Let only those who search with pure intent find the way beneath the temple."

3212.name: a watcher's ring
3212.room_desc: A steel ring etched with a tiny eye glints here.
3212.description: A simple steel band worn smooth from long service.

3213.name: a battered watch coffer
3213.room_desc: A battered watch coffer rests against the wall.
3213.description: Its hinges creak and the lock is stiff with rust.

3214.name: a rusted watch-key
3214.room_desc: A rusted iron key has been left here.
3214.description: An old key stamped with the watch sigil.

3215.name: dragon steak
3215.room_desc: A perfectly cooked dragon steak sits here, still sizzling.
3215.description: This thick cut of dragon meat is seared to perfection, radiating heat and a mouthwatering aroma. Eating it is said to grant the strength of dragons.
3215.food_message: The dragon's power surges through your muscles!

3216.name: pixie dust cake
3216.room_desc: A small cake dusted with glittering pixie dust rests here.
3216.description: This delicate confection sparkles with authentic pixie dust. Those who eat it report feeling lighter than air and incredibly quick.
3216.food_message: You feel light as a feather and quick as lightning!

3217.name: mindflayer brain
3217.room_desc: A preserved brain floats in a jar of strange fluid.
3217.description: This grotesque delicacy is prized by dark mages for the psionic residue it contains. Consuming it is said to enhance mental acuity... if you can stomach it.
3217.food_message: Alien thoughts flood your mind, expanding your consciousness!

3218.name: phoenix egg omelette
3218.room_desc: A golden omelette radiates warmth here.
3218.description: Made from the incredibly rare phoenix egg, this omelette glows with inner fire. Those who eat it are said to recover from wounds with supernatural speed.
3218.food_message: Warmth spreads through your body, accelerating your healing!

3219.name: giants stew
3219.room_desc: A massive cauldron of hearty stew steams here.
3219.description: This thick, meaty stew was made by giants using their secret recipe. A single bowl can fill even the hungriest adventurer and toughens the body.
3219.food_message: The hearty stew fortifies your constitution!

3220.name: ambrosia
3220.room_desc: A crystal vial of golden ambrosia glows softly here.
3220.description: The food of the gods themselves. This divine nectar restores both body and spirit, granting temporary blessings to all who consume it.
3220.food_message: Divine power flows through you! All your abilities are enhanced!

3221.name: shadowfruit
3221.room_desc: A fruit that seems to absorb light sits here.
3221.description: This rare fruit grows only in the deepest shadows. It tastes of midnight and secrets, and grants those who eat it the ability to move unseen.
3221.food_message: Shadows cling to you, making you harder to detect!

3222.name: battle ration
3222.room_desc: A magically preserved battle ration lies here.
3222.description: Standard issue for elite soldiers, this enchanted ration never spoils and provides both sustenance and combat readiness.
